property.name: include
property.value: Map:Common Data

property.name: description
property.value: The [[party]] hears the church bells ringing, and they notice the [[Dark Fountain]] in the distance.

property.name: description
property.value: The [[party]] notices the prophecy window depicting the Angel. Despite being obscured to the [[player]], the party is able to view the image in full.

properties.property: Serves to remind the [[party]] about enemies they have not yet [[Recruits|recruited]]. * '''Recruited everyone:''' ''It seems you have spared everyone you could.'' * '''Missing recruits:''' ''But, you haven't spared everyone you could yet. Should you go forward? The bell leaves it up to you.'' * '''Missing [[Miss Mizzle]]:''' ''But, there is a foe you haven't met and spared yet. It might not matter. The bell leaves it up to you.'' * '''LOST recruits:''' ''... but the bell rung hollow.''

property.name: description
property.value: [[Jackenstein]] helps the [[party]] climb the tower, but the [[Knight]] destroys it before they can reach the top. If enough enemies were recruited, they catch Jackenstein as he falls and boost the party to the top. Otherwise, the party witnesses Jackenstein fall to his presumed death and climb the tower without him.

property.name: description
property.value: The hallway gets progressively darker as the [[party]] continues forward. [[Kris]]'s [[SOUL]] begins to light up, allowing the party to continue walking as the [[Knight]] attempts to impede their progress.

property.name: description
property.value: The [[party]] confronts the [[Knight]] in front of the [[Dark Fountain]]. As [[Susie]] claims that they are powerless in the Light World, the Knight creates a Dark Fountain in the center of the room, which transforms into the [[Titan (Chapter 4)|Titan]].

property.name: description
property.value: [[Kris]] must climb the [[Titan (Chapter 4)|Titan]]'s tower while avoiding hazards.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Ralsei]] explains the nature of the [[Titans]] to [[Kris]] and [[Susie]] while taking a break from climbing. When the Titan notices them, they run to the right and are ambushed by [[Titan Spawn]].

property.name: description
property.value: [[Kris]] must climb the [[Titan (Chapter 4)|Titan]]'s tower while avoiding hazards and the darkness from below.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Kris]] must jump from their spot to attack the eye three times.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] catches [[Kris]] as they jump toward her, and she throws them upwards.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Ralsei]] expresses relief that the [[party]] was able to defeat the [[Titan (Chapter 4)|Titan]]. However, when he notices [[Susie]] missing, he panics and runs forward.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Ralsei]] notices the prophecy window mentioning the Last Prophecy and attempts to catch [[Susie]] before she can read it in full.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] smashes the prophecy window before [[Kris]] can view it. She reassures [[Ralsei]] that they will not allow the prophecy to come to pass. She walks to the [[Dark Fountain]].

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] tells [[Kris]] of her hope that things can go back to the way they were before. Kris then seals the [[Dark Fountain]].

properties.property: All around you, blue glass glitters like crystals. As you approach it, the glowing light shines through them... ... creating a prism only you can see.

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE Point in the Stairs area.

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE Point in the Last Chamber.

property.name: description
property.value: ''THEY'LL HEAR THE RING OF HEAVEN'S CALL.''

property.name: description
property.value: ''THEY'LL SEE THE TAIL OF HELL TAKE CRAWL.''

property.name: description
property.value: ''JOCKINGTON GROWS THE BEARD.''

properties.property: THE FLOWER MAN, TRAPPED IN ASYLUM.
THE ANGEL, BANISHED, WILL FINALLY MEET WITH ITS DESIRE.
A WORLD BASKED IN PUREST LIGHT. BENEATH IT, GREW ETERNAL NIGHT.
THE LIGHT AND DARK, BOTH BURNING DIRE. A COUNTDOWN TO THE EARTH'S EXPIRE.
IF FOUNTAINS FREED, THE ROARING CRIES. AND TITANS SHAPE FROM DARKENED EYES.
THE LAST PROPHECY. THE STORY'S END.
AND THEN. WHEN ALL HOPE IS LOST FOR THE TALE

property.name: description
property.value: ''THE FINAL TRAGEDY UNVEILS.''

properties.property: TO SAVE THE WORLDS, THERE IS ONLY ONE WAY.
ONLY THEN, WILL THE WORLDS BE SAVED.

property.name: description
property.value: Treasure chest containing a [[Princess Ribbon]].

property.name: page
property.value: Princess Ribbon

property.name: description
property.value: Treasure chest containing a Waferguard

property.name: description
property.value: Treasure chest containing a Scarlixir.

property.name: description
property.value: Treasure chest containing a Rhapsotea.

property.name: description
property.value: Claims that a serpentine "shadow" will grow before the clock strikes midnight.

property.name: description
property.value: Asks the [[party]] if they have missed anything. Answering no causes them to open a doorway to the [[2nd Sanctuary#Windows and ROOTS Room|windoed hallway]] from the [[2nd Sanctuary]].

property.name: description
property.value: Provides [[items]] to the [[party]] if they lose to the [[Titan (Chapter 4)|Titan]] twice.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Ralsei]] laments that the [[party]]'s fate is already decided. He attempts to reassure [[Kris]] that he is smiling, to which Kris can respond with "It's okay not to smile" or "Good. Keep smiling." Ralsei, inspired by [[Susie]]'s hope, resolves to believe that things can change.

property.name: description
property.value: Appears after stepping on the pressure plate. Can be seen if the [[party]] follows the ripples to the beginning of the room.

property.name: description
property.value: Guei flame in the 3rd Sanctuary entrance. Unlocks after reaching the Stairs area.

property.name: description
property.value: Guei flame in the Stairs area. Can transport the [[party]] back to the 3rd Sanctuary entrance.

property.name: description
property.value: Guei flame in the Stairs area. Unlocks after reaching the Last Chamber.

property.name: description
property.value: Guei flame in the Last Chamber. Can transport the party back to the Stairs area.

property.name: description
property.value: Allows the party to make [[Scarlixir]]s for 500 [[Dark Dollar]]s each and [[Rhapsotea]]s for 300 Dark Dollars each.

property.name: description
property.value: After activating this switch, [[Kris]] must make their way across the gaps without getting caught by the water that flows downward.

property.name: description
property.value: Intentionally falling from this tile leads the [[party]] to a secret area.

property.name: description
property.value: Lift that transports the [[party]] back to the beginning.

property.name: description
property.value: Pressing this switch reveals a hint on how to navigate the piano puzzle: ''down'', ''left'', ''up''.

property.name: description
property.value: The [[party]] must navigate the puzzle by inputting directions on the piano while avoiding the darkness that creeps upward.

property.name: description
property.value: Pressing this switch darkens the room and causes the corresponding sun switch to take its place.

property.name: description
property.value: Pressing this switch darkens the room and causes the corresponding sun switch to take its place.

property.name: description
property.value: Pressing this switch brightens up the room and causes the corresponding moon switch to appear in its place.

property.name: description
property.value: Pressing this switch brightens up the room and causes the corresponding moon switch to appear in its place.

property.name: description
property.value: After clearing the [[Bibliox]] encounter, the remaining books shoot flames at the [[party]].

property.name: description
property.value: The [[party]] must navigate the area while avoiding the Dark Eyeballs, which periodically appear in various formations.

property.name: description
property.value: Dark Eyeballs that damages [[Kris]] if touched. Can be destroyed by jumping into them while climbing.

property.name: description
property.value: Dark Eyeballs that damages [[Kris]] if touched. Can be destroyed by jumping into them while climbing.

property.name: description
property.value: Eyes that cry black liquid that damages [[Kris]] if touched.

property.value: Eyes that cry black liquid that damages [[Kris]] if touched.

property.value: Eyes that cry black liquid that damages [[Kris]] if touched.

property.name: description
property.value: Eyes that cry black liquid that damages [[Kris]] if touched.

property.name: description
property.value: Dark Eyeballs that damages [[Kris]] if touched. Can be destroyed by jumping into them while climbing.

property.name: description
property.value: Bullets that damage [[Kris]] if touched.

property.name: description
property.value: Groups of bullets that damage [[Kris]] if touched.

property.name: description
property.value: Openings that continuously spawn Dark Eyeballs.

property.value: Eyes that cry black liquid that damages [[Kris]] if touched.

property.value: Groups of bullets that damage [[Kris]] if touched.

property.value: Groups of bullets that damage [[Kris]] if touched.

property.value: Eyes that cry black liquid that damages [[Kris]] if touched.

property.value: Enemy encounter against a [[Bibliox]] and [[Winglade]].

property.value: Enemy encounter against a [[Balthizard]], [[Mizzle]], and [[Guei]]

property.value: Enemy encounter against two [[Organikk]]s and a [[Wicabel]].

property.value: Answering no to the NPC on the left causes them to open a doorway to the [[2nd Sanctuary#Windows and ROOTS Room|windoed hallway]] from the [[2nd Sanctuary]].
